awesome-angular-components.desc: A community index of components and libraries maintained on GitHub
awesome-angular-components.descCn: GitHub 上維護的元件和庫的社群索引
awesome-angular-components.title: Catalog of Angular Components & Libraries

angular-ru.desc: Angular-RU Community on GitHub is a single entry point for all resources, chats, podcasts and meetups for Angular in Russia.
angular-ru.descCn: GitHub 上的 Angular-RU 社群是俄羅斯 Angular 的所有資源、聊天、播客和聚會的單一入口。
angular-ru.title: Angular Conferences and Angular Camps in Moscow, Russia.
angular-ru.titleCn: 俄羅斯莫斯科的 Angular 會議和營地。

made-with-angular.desc: A showcase of web apps built with Angular.
made-with-angular.descCn: 展示了基於 Angular 建構的 Web 應用程式。
made-with-angular.title: Made with Angular

angular-devto.desc: Read and share content and chat about Angular on DEV Community.
angular-devto.descCn: 在 DEV 社群上閱讀和共享有關 Angular 的內容並聊天。
angular-devto.title: DEV Community

indepth-dev.descCn: 同行評審過的 Angular 文章和課程。
indepth-dev.title: Angular inDepth

angular-nation.desc: Angular Nation is a free private network created for Angular developers to network, collaborate, and ask questions.
angular-nation.title: Angular Nation
angular-nation.descCn: Angular Nation 是一個免費的專用網路，為 Angular 開發人員建立的網路、協作和提問。

angular-builders.desc: A collection of Angular builders for your Angular projects
angular-builders.title: Angular Builders
angular-builders.descCn: 適用於你的 Angular 專案的 Angular 建構器集合

butter-cms.desc: Add API Based CMS to your Angular app
butter-cms.title: API Based CMS with Butter
butter-cms.descCn: 將基於 API 的 CMS 新增到你的 Angular 應用程式
butter-cms.titleCn: 使用 Butter 的基於 API 的 CMS

angular-community-meetup.desc: Come learn technical skills and network at this monthly, multi-series, multi-event, multi-timezone online meetup.
angular-community-meetup.title: Angular Community Meetup
angular-community-meetup.descCn: 快來在這個每月一次的、多系列、多事件、多時區的線上聚會上學習技術技能和人脈。

This-is-Angular.desc: Inclusive Angular publication free from conflict of interest. This publication is all about sharing Angular knowledge for free and not at all about money or KPIs. Cross-posts are welcome. Part of This is Learning.
This-is-Angular.title: This is Angular
This-is-Angular.descCn: 無利益衝突的包容性 Angular 出版物。本出版物完全是關於免費分享 Angular 知識，而不是關於金錢或 KPI。歡迎交叉帖子。這是學習的一部分。

adventures-in-angular.desc: Adventures in Angular is a weekly podcast dedicated to the Angular platform and related technologies, tools, languages, and practices.
adventures-in-angular.descCn: Angular 歷險記是一個每週播客，致力於 Angular 平台以及相關技術、工具、語言和實踐。
adventures-in-angular.title: Adventures in Angular

angular-show.title: The Angular Show
angular-show.descCn: ng-conf 的官方全 Angular 播客。

angular-air.desc: Weekly video podcast hosted by Jeff Whelpley with all the latest and greatest happenings in the wild world of Angular.
angular-air.descCn: 由 Jeff Whelpley 主持的每週影片播客，其中包含 Angular 世界中的所有最新和最大的事件。
angular-air.title: AngularAir

angular-rocks.desc: Podcast for those who want to know more about Angular 🚀
angular-rocks.title: Angular Rocks
angular-rocks.descCn: 面向那些想了解更多關於 Angular 的人的播客 🚀

angular-master-podcast.desc: Listen / Code / Repeat. Everything you need to fall in love with Angular for a long time.
angular-master-podcast.title: Angular Master Podcast
angular-master-podcast.descCn: 聽/編碼/重複。長時間愛上 Angular 所需的一切。

javascript-master-podcast.desc: Listen / Code / Repeat. Everything you need to know to become an informed JavaScript developer.
javascript-master-podcast.title: JavaScript Master Podcast
javascript-master-podcast.descCn: 聽/編碼/重複。要成為一名訊息靈通的 JavaScript 開發人員，你需要了解的一切。

happy-angular.desc: A weekly German podcast for Angular on the go
happy-angular.descCn: 德國的 Angular 每週播客
happy-angular.title: Happy Angular

ngruair.desc: Russian language video podcast about Angular.
ngruair.descCn: 關於 Angular 的俄語影片播客。
ngruair.title: NgRuAir

ngxp.desc: Weekly technical-adjacent podcast by Brooke Avery & Erik Slack. Don't just code in Angular, come enjoy the Angular Experience!
ngxp.descCn: 有關 Angular、RxJS、TypeScript 和其他技術的高階 Web 開發播客。僅英語，音訊。
ngxp.title: Angular Experience (NgXP)

a3b.desc: Ionic offers a library of mobile-optimized HTML, CSS and JS components and tools for building highly interactive native and progressive web apps.
a3b.descCn: Ionic 提供了一個針對移動裝置最佳化過的 HTML、CSS 和 JS 元件庫和工具庫，用於建構高度互動的原生和漸進式 Web 應用程式。
a3b.title: Ionic

a4b.descCn: Electron 平台 上的 Angular。
a4b.title: Electron

ab.desc: NativeScript is how you build cross-platform, native iOS and Android apps with Angular and TypeScript. Get 100% access to native APIs via JavaScript and reuse of packages from NPM, CocoaPods and Gradle. Open source and backed by Telerik.
ab.descCn: NativeScript 能讓你使用 Angular 和 TypeScript 建構跨平臺、原生 iOS 和 Android 應用程式。透過 JavaScript 以及對 NPM、CocoaPods 和 Gradle 中套件的複用，可 100％存取原生 API。開源並得到 Telerik 的支援。
ab.title: NativeScript

formly.desc: Formly is a dynamic (JSON powered) form library, built on top of Angular Reactive Forms.
formly.descCn: Formly 是基於 Angular 響應式表單建構的動態（基於 JSON 的）表單庫。
formly.title: Formly

rx-web.desc: RxWeb Reactive Form Validators provides all types of complex, conditional, cross field, and dynamic validation on validator-based reactive forms, model-based reactive forms, and template driven forms.
rx-web.descCn: RxWeb 響應式表單驗證器為基於驗證器的響應式表單、基於模型的響應式表單和範本驅動的表單提供了所有型別的複雜、條件化、跨欄位和動態的驗證。
rx-web.title: RxWeb Reactive Form Validators
rx-web.titleCn: RxWeb 響應式表單驗證器

rx-angular.desc: RxAngular is a reactive library that provides extensions for developing high performant and scalable applications. It addresses the issues of local state management, rendering performance, and reactive architecture.
rx-angular.title: rx-angular
rx-angular.descCn: RxAngular 是一個響應式庫，為開發高效能和可擴充應用程式提供了擴充。它解決了本地狀態管理、渲染效能和響應式架構的問題。

ngxs.desc: NGXS is a state management pattern + library for Angular. NGXS is modeled after the CQRS pattern popularly implemented in libraries like Redux and NgRx but reduces boilerplate by using modern TypeScript features such as classes and decorators.
ngxs.descCn: NGXS 是 Angular 的狀態管理模式+庫。NGXS 是根據 Redux 和 NgRx 等庫中普遍實現的 CQRS 模式進行建模的，但是透過使用現代 TypeScript 功能（如類和裝飾器）減少了樣板程式碼。
ngxs.title: NGXS

akita.desc: Akita is a state management pattern, built on top of RxJS, which takes the idea of multiple data stores from Flux and the immutable updates from Redux, along with the concept of streaming data, to create the Observable Data Store model.
akita.descCn: 秋田（Akita）是一種狀態管理模式，建立在 RxJS 之上，它採用 Flux 的多資料儲存和 Redux 的不可變更新以及流資料的概念來建立 Observable Data Store 模型。
akita.title: Akita

ab.desc: The official library for Firebase and Angular
ab.descCn: Firebase 和 Angular 的官方庫
ab.title: Angular Fire

ab2.desc: Use Angular and Meteor to build full-stack JavaScript apps  for Mobile and Desktop.
ab2.descCn: 使用 Angular 和 Meteor 建構用於移動和桌面的全棧 JavaScript 應用。
ab2.title: Meteor

ab3.desc: Apollo is a data stack for modern apps, built with GraphQL.
ab3.descCn: Apollo 是使用 GraphQL 建構現代應用程式的資料技術棧。
ab3.title: Apollo

ngx-api-utils.desc: ngx-api-utils is a lean library of utilities and helpers to quickly integrate any HTTP API (REST, Ajax, and any other) with Angular.
ngx-api-utils.descCn: ngx-api-utils 是一個精簡的實用程式和幫助程式庫，用於快速將任何 HTTP API（REST、Ajax 等）與 Angular 整合。
ngx-api-utils.title: ngx-api-utils

butter.desc: ButterCMS is a headless CMS that lets you manage content using our dashboard and integrate it into your Angular Application
butter.title: ButterCMS
butter.descCn: ButterCMS 是一個無頭 CMS，可讓你使用我們的儀表板管理內容並將其整合到你的 Angular 應用程式

ab.desc: VS Code is a Free, Lightweight Tool for Editing and Debugging Web Apps.
ab.descCn: VS Code 是用於編輯和除錯 Web 應用程式的免費、輕量級工具。
ab.title: Visual Studio Code

ab2.desc: Lightweight yet powerful IDE, perfectly equipped for complex client-side development and server-side development with Node.js
ab2.descCn: 輕巧但功能強大的 IDE，完全適合透過 Node.js 進行復雜的客戶端開發和伺服器端開發
ab2.title: WebStorm

ab3.descCn: 功能強大且符合人體工程學的 Java * IDE
ab3.title: IntelliJ IDEA

angular-ide.desc: Built first and foremost for Angular. Turnkey setup for beginners; powerful for experts.
angular-ide.descCn: 首先為 Angular 建構。對初學者提供交鑰匙設定；對專家提供強大的功能。
angular-ide.title: Angular IDE by Webclipse

amexio-canvas.desc: Amexio Canvas is Drag and Drop Environment to create Fully Responsive Web and Smart Device HTML5/Angular Apps. Code will be auto generated and hot deployed by the Canvas for live testing. Out of the box 50+ Material Design Theme support. Commit your code to GitHub public or private repository.
amexio-canvas.descCn: Amexio Canvas 是一個拖放式環境，用於建立完全響應式的 Web 和智慧裝置的 HTML5 / Angular 應用程式。程式碼將由 Canvas 自動產生並進行熱部署以進行即時測試。開箱即用的 50 多種 Material Design Theme 支援。可以將你的程式碼提交到 GitHub 公共或私有儲存庫。
amexio-canvas.title: Amexio Canvas Web Based Drag and Drop IDE by MetaMagic
amexio-canvas.titleCn: MetaMagic 的 Amexio Canvas 是基於 Web 的拖放式 IDE

ub.desc: UI Bakery is a low code platform to generate Angular applications.
ub.descCn: Google Chrome 開發工具的擴充程式，用於除錯 Angular 應用程式。
ub.title: UI Bakery

b1.descCn: Angular 應用程式的伺服器端渲染。
b1.title: Angular Universal

c1.descCn: 僅供開發使用的輕量級 Node.js® 伺服器
c1.title: Lite-server

cli.desc: The official Angular CLI makes it easy to create and develop applications from initial commit to production deployment. It already follows our best practices right out of the box!
cli.descCn: 官方的 Angular CLI 使建立和開發應用程式變得很容易，從最初的提交到生產部署。它已經按照我們的最佳實踐開箱即用！
cli.title: Angular CLI

angular-eslint.desc: The tooling which enables ESLint to lint Angular projects.
angular-eslint.descCn: Angular 專案的靜態分析工具。
angular-eslint.title: Angular ESLint

f1.desc: This tool generates dedicated documentation for Angular applications.
f1.descCn: 該工具為 Angular 應用程式產生專用文件。
f1.title: Compodoc

docgeni.desc: A modern, powerful and out of the box documentation generator for Angular component lib and markdown docs.
docgeni.title: Docgeni
docgeni.descCn: 用於 Angular 元件庫和 markdown 文件的現代、強大且開箱即用的文件產生器。

angular-playground.desc: UI development environment for building, testing, and documenting Angular applications.
angular-playground.descCn: 用於開發、測試和文件化 Angular 應用程式的 UI 開發環境。
angular-playground.title: Angular Playground

angular-prerender.desc: A command line tool to prerender Angular Apps that uses Angular Universal but also supports Scully plugins.
angular-prerender.title: angular-prerender
angular-prerender.descCn: 一種預渲染 Angular 應用程式的命令列工具，它使用 Angular Universal 但也支援 Scully 外掛。

nx.desc: Nx is an open source build system featuring a lot of monorepo features that help enterprise teams develop Angular at scale.
nx.descCn: Nx 是一個基於 Angular CLI 建構的開源工具套件，可幫助企業團隊大規模開發 Angular。
nx.title: Nx - Smart, Fast and Extensible Build System
nx.titleCn: Nx - 智慧、快速、可擴充的建構體系

protractor.desc: The official end to end testing framework for Angular applications.
protractor.descCn: Angular 應用的官方端到端測試框架
protractor.title: Protractor

observer-spy.desc: A library for testing RxJS observables that offers an alternative to Marble Tests.
observer-spy.title: observer-spy
observer-spy.descCn: 一個用於測試 RxJS observables 的函式庫，它提供了 Marble Tests 的替代方案。

scully.desc: Scully (Jamstack Toolchain for Angular) makes building, testing, and deploying Jamstack apps extremely simple.
scully.descCn: Scully（用於 Angular 的 Jamstack 工具鏈）使建構、測試和部署 Jamstack 應用程式極為簡單。
scully.title: Scully

ng-mocks.desc: A testing library for creating mock services, components, directives, pipes and modules out of annoying dependencies in unit tests.
ng-mocks.title: ng-mocks
ng-mocks.descCn: 一個測試庫，用於從單元測試中煩人的依賴項中建立模擬服務、元件、指令、管道和模組。

234237.desc: UX guidelines, HTML/CSS framework, and Angular components working together to craft exceptional experiences
234237.descCn: 讓 UX 準則、HTML/CSS 框架和 Angular 元件一起工作，以創造出非凡的體驗
234237.title: Clarity Design System

AngularUIToolkit.desc: Angular UI Toolkit: 115 professionally maintained UI components ranging from a robust grid to charts and more. Try for free & build Angular apps faster.
AngularUIToolkit.descCn: Angular UI Toolkit：115 個專業維護的 UI 元件，包括健壯的網格、圖表等等。可免費試用並能更快地建構 Angular 應用。
AngularUIToolkit.title: Angular UI Toolkit

SenchaforAngular.desc: Build modern web apps faster with 115+ pre-built UI components. Try for free and download today.
SenchaforAngular.descCn: 使用 115+ 個預建構的 UI 元件更快地建構現代 Web 應用程式。免費試用並立即下載。
SenchaforAngular.title: Sencha for Angular

IgniteUIforAngular.desc: Ignite UI for Angular is a dependency-free Angular toolkit for building modern web apps.
IgniteUIforAngular.descCn: Ignite UI for Angular 是用於建構現代 Web 應用程式的無依賴 Angular 工具套件。
IgniteUIforAngular.title: Ignite UI for Angular
IgniteUIforAngular.titleCn: 用於 Angular 的 Ignite UI

DevExtreme.desc: 50+ UI components including data grid, pivot grid, scheduler, charts, editors, maps and other multi-purpose controls for creating highly responsive web applications for touch devices and traditional desktops.
DevExtreme.descCn: 50 多個 UI 元件，包括資料網格、資料透視網格、排程器、圖表、編輯器、地圖和其他多功能控制項，用於為觸控裝置和傳統桌上型電腦建立高響應性的 Web 應用程式。
DevExtreme.title: DevExtreme

-KMVB8P4TDfht8c0L1AE.desc: The Angular version of the Angular UI Bootstrap library. This library is being built from scratch in Typescript using the Bootstrap 4 CSS framework.
-KMVB8P4TDfht8c0L1AE.descCn: Angular UI Bootstrap 庫的 Angular 版本。該函式庫是使用 Bootstrap 4 CSS 框架在 Typescript 中從頭開始建構的。
-KMVB8P4TDfht8c0L1AE.title: ng-bootstrap

4ab.desc: Native Angular components & directives for Lightning Design System
4ab.descCn: Lightning 設計體系的原生 Angular 元件和指令
4ab.title: ng-lightning

7ab.desc: UI components for hybrid mobile apps with bindings for both Angular & AngularJS.
7ab.descCn: 具有 Angular 和 AngularJS 繫結的混合式移動應用的 UI 元件。
7ab.title: Onsen UI

a2b.desc: PrimeNG is a collection of rich UI components for Angular
a2b.descCn: PrimeNG 是 Angular 的富 UI 元件集合
a2b.title: Prime Faces

a3b.desc: A professional grade library of Angular UI components written in TypeScript that includes our Data Grid, TreeView, Charts, Editors, DropDowns, DatePickers, and many more. Features include support for AOT compilation, Tree Shaking for high-performance, localization, and accessibility.
a3b.descCn: 用 TypeScript 編寫的 Angular UI 元件的專業級庫，其中包括我們的資料網格、TreeView、圖表、編輯器、下拉框、DatePickers 等。功能包括支援 AOT 編譯、支援高效能的搖樹最佳化、支援本地化和無障礙性。
a3b.title: Kendo UI

a5b.desc: High-performance UI controls with the most complete Angular support available. Wijmo’s controls are all written in TypeScript and have zero dependencies. FlexGrid control includes full declarative markup, including cell templates.
a5b.descCn: 具有最完整的 Angular 支援的高效能 UI 控制項。Wijmo 的控制項全部用 TypeScript 編寫，並且具有零依賴性。FlexGrid 控制項包括完整的宣告性標記語言，包括單元格範本。
a5b.title: Wijmo

a6b.desc: Material design inspired UI components for building great web apps. For mobile and desktop.
a6b.descCn: 受 Material Design 啟發的用於構建出色的 Web 應用程式的 UI 元件庫。適用於手機和桌上型電腦。
a6b.title: Vaadin

a7b.descCn: Bootstrap 的原生 Angular 指令
a7b.title: ngx-bootstrap

ab.descCn: Angular 的 Material Design 元件庫
ab.title: Angular Material

mdb5.desc: Free components, templates & plugins for the latest Bootstrap 5 styled in accordance with Material Design 2.0 (guidelines introduced in 2020)
mdb5.title: Angular & Material Design 2.0 for Bootstrap 5
mdb5.descCn: 根據 Material Design 2.0 風格的最新 Bootstrap 5 的免費元件、範本和外掛（2020 年推出的指南）
mdb5.titleCn: Bootstrap 5 的 Angular 和 Material Design 2.0

mdb4.desc: Free components, templates & plugins for the latest Bootstrap 4 styled in accordance with Material Design (guidelines introduced in 2015)
mdb4.title: Angular & Material Design for Bootstrap 4
mdb4.descCn: 根據 Material Design 風格的最新 Bootstrap 4 的免費元件、範本和外掛（2015 年推出的指南）
mdb4.titleCn: Bootstrap 4 的 Angular 和 Material 設計

mcc.desc: Material components made by the community that includes Color Picker, Timer Picker, Speed Dial and Scrollspy
mcc.descCn: 社群開發的一些 Material 元件
mcc.title: Material Community Components

mosaic.desc: Positive Technologies UI components based on Angular
mosaic.descCn: 基於 Angular 的正面技術 UI 元件
mosaic.title: Mosaic - Angular UI Components

ngzorro.desc: A set of enterprise-class UI components based on Ant Design and Angular
ngzorro.descCn: 一組基於 Ant Design 和 Angular 的企業級 UI 元件
ngzorro.title: Ant Design of Angular (ng-zorro-antd)
ngzorro.titleCn: 供 Angular 使用的 Ant Design（ng-zorro-antd）

ngzorromobile.desc: A set of enterprise-class mobile UI components based on Ant Design Mobile and Angular
ngzorromobile.descCn: 一組基於 Ant Design Mobile 和 Angular 的企業級移動 UI 元件
ngzorromobile.title: Ant Design Mobile of Angular (ng-zorro-antd-mobile)
ngzorromobile.titleCn: 供 Angular 使用的 Ant Design Mobile（ng-zorro-antd-mobile）

aggrid.desc: A datagrid for Angular with enterprise style features such as sorting, filtering, custom rendering, editing, grouping, aggregation and pivoting.
aggrid.descCn: 具有企業風格特性的 Angular 資料網格，比如排序、過濾、自訂渲染、編輯、分組、聚合和透視。
aggrid.title: ag-Grid

angular-slickgrid.desc: Angular-SlickGrid is a wrapper of the lightning fast & customizable SlickGrid datagrid library with Bootstrap 3,4 themes
angular-slickgrid.descCn: Angular-SlickGrid 是具有 Bootstrap 3,4 主題的快速、可自訂的 SlickGrid 資料網格庫的包裝
angular-slickgrid.title: Angular-Slickgrid

fancygrid.desc: Angular grid library with charts integration and server communication for Enterprise.
fancygrid.descCn: 具有圖表整合和企業伺服器通訊功能的 Angular 網格庫。
fancygrid.title: FancyGrid

ngx-smart-modal.desc: Angular smart, light and fast modal handler to manage modals and data everywhere.
ngx-smart-modal.descCn: Angular 智慧、輕便、快速的模態框處理程式，可隨時隨地管理模態框和資料。
ngx-smart-modal.title: ngx-smart-modal

jqwidgets.desc: Angular UI Components including data grid, tree grid, pivot grid, scheduler, charts, editors and other multi-purpose components
jqwidgets.descCn: Angular UI 元件，包括資料網格、樹形網格、多維網格、排程器、圖表、編輯器和多種功能的元件
jqwidgets.title: jQWidgets

amexio.desc: Amexio is a rich set of Angular components powered by HTML5 & CSS3 for Responsive Web Design and 80+ built-in Material Design Themes. Amexio has 3 Editions, Standard, Enterprise and Creative. Std Edition consists of basic UI Components which include Grid, Tabs, Form Inputs and so on. While Enterprise Edition consists of components like Calendar, Tree Tabs, Social Media Logins (Facebook, GitHub, Twitter and so on) and Creative Edition is focused building elegant and beautiful websites. With more than 200+ components/features. All the editions are open-sourced and free, based on Apache 2 License.
amexio.descCn: Amexio 是一套由 HTML5 和 CSS3 支援的豐富的 Angular 元件，用於響應式 Web 設計和 80 多種內建的 Material Design 主題。Amexio 有 3 個版本，標準版、企業版和創意版。標準版由基本的 UI 元件組成，其中包括網格、選項卡、表單輸入等。企業版由日曆、樹形選項卡、社交媒體登入（Facebook，GitHub，Twitter 等）組成，而創意版則專注於建構美觀的網站。具有 200 多個元件/功能。所有版本都是基於 Apache 2 許可證的開源和免費版本。
amexio.title: Amexio - Angular Extensions

bm.desc: A lightweight Material Design library for Angular, based upon Google's Material Components for the Web
bm.descCn: 輕量級的 Angular Material Design 庫，基於 Google 的 Web Material 元件
bm.title: Blox Material

essentialjs2.desc: Essential JS 2 for Angular is a collection modern TypeScript based true Angular Components. It has support for Ahead Of Time (AOT) compilation and Tree-Shaking. All the components are developed from the ground up to be lightweight, responsive, modular and touch friendly.
essentialjs2.descCn: Essential JS 2 for Angular 是基於現代 TypeScript 的真正 Angular 元件的集合。它支援預先（AOT）編譯和搖樹最佳化。所有元件都是從零開始開發的，從而使其輕巧、響應迅速、模組化且對觸控友好。
essentialjs2.title: Essential JS 2

trulyui.desc: TrulyUI is an Angular UI Framework especially developed for Desktop Applications based on Web Components using the greatest technologies of the world.
trulyui.descCn: TrulyUI 是一個 Angular UI 框架，它是使用世界上最先進的技術為基於 Web 元件的桌面應用程式專門開發的。
trulyui.title: Truly UI

ngsqui.desc: Simple Quality UI (SQ-UI) is a flexible and easily customizable UI-kit, aiming to provide maximum efficiency with as little overhead as possible. Driven by the idea that it should be strictly "for developers by developers", every new feature release includes functionalities demanded by the developers who are using it.
ngsqui.descCn: Simple Quality UI（SQ-UI）是一種靈活且易於自訂的 UI 工具套件，旨在以儘可能少的開銷提供最大的效率。它嚴格遵守“供開發人員使用，由開發人員創造”的思想，每個新的特性發行版都包含使用它的開發人員所要求的功能。
ngsqui.title: Simple Quality UI

smart.desc: Web Components for Angular. Dependency-free Angular components for building modern and mobile-friendly web apps
smart.descCn: Angular 的 Web 元件。一些無依賴的 Angular 元件，用於建構現代且移動友好的 Web 應用程式
smart.title: Smart Web Components

AlyleUI.desc: Minimal Design, a set of components for Angular.
AlyleUI.descCn: 最小化設計，一組用於 Angular 的元件。
AlyleUI.title: Alyle UI

nebular.desc: Theme System, UI Components, Auth and Security for your next Angular application.
nebular.descCn: 為你的下一個 Angular 應用程式準備的主題體系、UI 元件、身份驗證和安全性。
nebular.title: Nebular

carbondesignsystem.desc: An Angular implementation of the Carbon Design System for IBM.
carbondesignsystem.descCn: IBM 的 Carbon Design System 的 Angular 實現。
carbondesignsystem.title: Carbon Components Angular
carbondesignsystem.titleCn: Carbon Design 的 Angular 元件庫

jigsaw.desc: Jigsaw provides a set of web components based on Angular. It is supporting the development of all applications of Big Data Product of ZTE (https://www.zte.com.cn).
jigsaw.descCn: Jigsaw 提供了一組基於 Angular 的 Web 元件。它支援中興通訊大資料產品（<https://www.zte.com.cn>）的所有應用程式的開發。
jigsaw.title: Awade Jigsaw (Chinese)

material-dayjs-adapter.desc: A DayJS implementation of @angular/material's DateAdapter that results in smaller bundle sizes than its MomentJS counterpart.
material-dayjs-adapter.descCn: @ angular/material 的 DateAdapter 的 DayJS 實現，其包比相應的 MomentJS 版小。
material-dayjs-adapter.title: material-dayjs-adapter

ngx-skeleton-loader.desc: NGX Skeleton Loader is a lightweight and A11Y friendly solution for blazing fast loading skeletons that automatically adapt to your Angular apps.
ngx-skeleton-loader.descCn: NGX Skeleton Loader 是一種輕巧且 A11Y 友好的解決方案，用於快速載入可自動適配 Angular 應用程式的骨架。
ngx-skeleton-loader.title: NGX Skeleton Loader

taiga-ui.desc: Taiga UI is fully-treeshakable Angular UI Kit consisting of multiple base libraries and several add-ons. We have 130+ components, 100+ directives, dozens of tokens, utils and tools. They are easily customizable and well engineered.
taiga-ui.title: Taiga UI
taiga-ui.descCn: Taiga UI 是完全可treeshakable 的 Angular UI 工具套件，由多個基礎庫和幾個附加元件組成。我們有 130 多個元件、100 多個指令、數十個標記、工具和工具。它們易於客製並且設計精良。

coreui-angular.desc: Open Source UI Components library for creating modern, beautiful, and responsive applications in half the time with high-performing and easy-to-customize UI components.
coreui-angular.title: CoreUI for Angular
coreui-angular.descCn: 開源 UI 元件庫，使用高效能且易於自訂的 UI 元件在一半的時間建立現代、美觀和響應式應用程式。

poui.desc: PO UI, Brazilian UI Components, focused on ease and productivity to Angular applications.
poui.title: PO UI
poui.descCn: PO UI，巴西 UI 元件，專注於 Angular 應用程式的易用性和生產力。

ngx-gantt.desc: A modern and powerful gantt chart component for Angular
ngx-gantt.title: Angular Gantt Chart Component
ngx-gantt.descCn: 用於 Angular 的現代且強大的甘特圖元件

ngx-youi.desc: NGX-YOUI is an Angular UI Library that can be highly customized with content and styles. You can easily integrate with other CSS frameworks and UI Library, such as Tailwind, Bootstrap, PrimeNG, Angular Material etc.
ngx-youi.title: NGX-YOUI
ngx-youi.descCn: NGX-YOUI 是一個 Angular UI 庫，可以用內容和樣式進行高度自訂。你可以輕鬆與其他 CSS 框架和 UI 庫整合，例如 Tailwind、Bootstrap、PrimeNG、Angular Material 等。

ngx-cookie-service.desc: NGX Cookie Service is an Angular Library that can be used to read, set and delete browser cookies
ngx-cookie-service.title: NGX Cookie Service
ngx-cookie-service.descCn: NGX Cookie 服務是一個 Angular 庫，可用於讀取、設定和刪除瀏覽器 Cookie

-KLIzGEp8Mh5W-FkiQnL.desc: A no-nonsense beginner's guide to building web applications with Angular and TypeScript
-KLIzGEp8Mh5W-FkiQnL.descCn: 使用 Angular 和 TypeScript 建構 Web 應用程式的入門指南
-KLIzGEp8Mh5W-FkiQnL.title: Learning Angular - Fourth Edition

3ab.desc: More than 15 books from O'Reilly about Angular
3ab.descCn: O'Reilly 撰寫的有關 Angular 的超過 15 本書
3ab.title: O'Reilly Media

a5b.desc: The in-depth, complete, and up-to-date book on Angular. Become an Angular expert today.
a5b.descCn: 關於 Angular 的深入、完整和最新的書。立即成為 Angular 專家。
a5b.title: ng-book

a7b.desc: This ebook will help you getting the philosophy of the framework: what comes from 1.x, what has been introduced and why
a7b.descCn: 這本電子書將幫助你瞭解框架的理念：來自 1.x 的內容、新引入的內容以及原因
a7b.title: Becoming a Ninja with Angular

ab.desc: More than 10 books from Packt Publishing about Angular
ab.descCn: Packt 出版了 10 多本有關 Angular 的書

cnoring-rxjs-fundamentals.desc: A free book that covers all facets of working with Rxjs from your first Observable to how to make your code run at optimal speed with Schedulers.
cnoring-rxjs-fundamentals.descCn: 一本免費的書，涵蓋了從你的第一個 Observable 到使用 Rxjs 的所有方面，以及如何利用 Scheduler 來使程式碼以最佳速度執行。
cnoring-rxjs-fundamentals.title: RxJS Ultimate

vsavkin-angular-router.desc: This book is a comprehensive guide to the Angular router written by its designer. The book explores the library in depth, including the mental model, design constraints, subtleties of the API.
vsavkin-angular-router.descCn: 本書是由其設計師編寫的有關 Angular 路由器的綜合指南。該書深入探討了庫，包括思維模型、設計約束、API 的精妙之處。
vsavkin-angular-router.title: Angular Router

vsavkin-essential-angular.desc: The book is a short, but at the same time, fairly complete overview of the key aspects of Angular written by its core contributors Victor Savkin and Jeff Cross. The book will give you a strong foundation. It will help you put all the concepts into right places. So you will get a good understanding of why the framework is the way it is.
vsavkin-essential-angular.descCn: 這本書是由核心貢獻者 Victor Savkin 和 Jeff Cross 撰寫的有關 Angular 關鍵方面的簡短但同時相當完整的概述。這本書將為你打下堅實的基礎。它將幫助你將所有概念放入正確的位置。這樣，你就能很好地理解本框架為何如此。
vsavkin-essential-angular.title: Essential Angular

angular-buch.desc: The first German book about Angular. It gives you a detailed practical overview of the key concepts of the platform. In each chapter a sample application is built upon with a new Angular topic. All sources are available on GitHub.
angular-buch.descCn: 第一本有關 Angular 的德語書籍。它為你提供了平台關鍵概念的詳細實踐概述。在每一章中，範例應用程式都是基於新的 Angular 主題建構的。所有資源都可以在 GitHub 上找到。
angular-buch.title: Angular-Buch (German)

wishtack-guide-angular.desc: The free, open-source and up-to-date Angular guide. This pragmatic guide is focused on best practices and will drive you from scratch to cloud.
wishtack-guide-angular.descCn: 免費、開源的最新 Angular 指南。本實用指南側重於最佳實踐，它將帶你從無到有。
wishtack-guide-angular.title: The Angular Guide by Wishtack (Français)

The book covers the most important Angular topics, from getting started with the Angular toolchain to writing Angular applications in a scalable and maintainable manner.

toddmotto-ultimateangular.desc: Online courses providing in-depth coverage of the Angular ecosystem, AngularJS, Angular and TypeScript, with functional code samples and a full-featured seed environment. Get a deep understanding of Angular and TypeScript from foundation to functional application, then move on to advanced topics with Todd Motto and collaborators.

500tech.desc: Learn from 500Tech, an Angular consultancy in Israel.  This course was built by an expert developer, who lives and breathes Angular, and has practical experience  with real world large scale Angular apps.
500tech.descCn: 向以色列的 Angular 諮詢公司 500Tech 學習。本課程由整天使用 Angular 的專業開發人員建構，並具有實際的大型 Angular 應用程式實踐經驗。
500tech.title: Angular Hands-on Course (Israel)

9ab.desc: OnSite Training From the Authors of  "Become A Ninja with Angular"
9ab.descCn: 來自“成為 Angular 忍者”作者的現場培訓
9ab.title: Ninja Squad

a2b.desc: Angular Boot Camp covers introductory through advanced Angular topics. It includes extensive workshop sessions, with hands-on help from our experienced developer-trainers. We take developers or teams from the beginnings of Angular understanding through a working knowledge of all essential Angular features.
a2b.descCn: Angular 新兵訓練營涵蓋了高階 Angular 主題的介紹。它包括廣泛的研討會，在我們經驗豐富的開發人員培訓人員的動手幫助下。我們從對 Angular 的瞭解開始就透過對所有 Angular 基本功能的實際瞭解來吸引開發人員或團隊。
a2b.title: Angular Boot Camp

ab3.desc: Trainings & Code Reviews. We help people to get a deep understanding of different technologies through trainings and code reviews. Our services can be arranged online, making it possible to join in from anywhere in the world, or on-site to get the best experience possible.
ab3.descCn: 培訓和程式碼審查。我們透過培訓和程式碼審查幫助人們深入瞭解不同的技術。我們的服務可以線上安排，從而可以從世界任何地方加入，也可以在現場加入以獲得最佳體驗。
ab3.title: Thoughtram

jsru.desc: Complete Angular online course. Constantly updating. Real-time webinars with immediate feedback from the teacher.
jsru.descCn: 完成 Angular 線上課程。不斷更新。即時線上研討會，並得到老師的即時反饋。
jsru.title: Learn Javascript (Russian)

zenika-angular.descCn: Zenika（法國）提供的 Angular 培訓
zenika-angular.title: Angular Trainings (French)

formationjs.desc: Angular onsite training in Paris (France). Monthly Angular workshops and custom onsite classes. We are focused on Angular, so we are always up to date.
formationjs.descCn: 在法國巴黎進行的 Angular 現場培訓。每月的 Angular 研討會和客製的現場課程。我們專注於 Angular，因此我們始終處於最新狀態。
formationjs.title: Formation JavaScript (French)

humancoders-angular.desc: Angular trainings delivered by Human Coders (France)
humancoders-angular.descCn: 由人類編碼員提供的 Angular 培訓（法國）
humancoders-angular.title: Formation Angular (French)

wao.desc: Onsite Angular Training delivered by We Are One Sàrl in Switzerland
wao.descCn: We Are One Sàrl 在瑞士提供的現場 Angular 培訓
wao.title: We Are One Sàrl

angular-schule.desc: Angular onsite training and public workshops in Germany from the authors of the German Angular book. We also regularly post articles and videos on our blog (in English and German language).
angular-schule.descCn: 來自德國的 Angular 書的作者在德國矩形 Angular 現場培訓和公共研討會。我們還會定期在部落格上釋出文章和影片（使用英語和德語）。
angular-schule.title: Angular.Schule (German)

simplified.desc: Angular and RxJS trainings, Code Reviews and consultancy. We help software engineers all over the world to create better web-applications...
simplified.descCn: Angular 和 RxJS 培訓、程式碼審查和諮詢。我們幫助世界各地的軟體工程師建立更好的 Web 應用程式...
simplified.title: Simplified Courses

angular.de.desc: Onsite Angular Training delivered by the greatest community in the german speaking area in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. We also regularly post articles and tutorials on our blog.
angular.de.descCn: 由德語區最大的社群在德國、奧地利和瑞士提供的現場 Angular 培訓。我們還定期在部落格上釋出文章和課程。
angular.de.title: Angular.de (German)

AngularArchitects.desc: In-depth training and consulting with focus on enterprise-scale Angular applications and architecture (remote, on-site company trainings, and public workshops). We also blog about these topics on a regular basis.
AngularArchitects.descCn: 深入培訓和諮詢，重點關注企業級 Angular 應用程式和架構（遠端，現場公司培訓和公共研討會）。我們還會定期釋出有關這些主題的部落格。
AngularArchitects.title: Angular Architects (German and English)
